mapper.select:
SELECT
,
, FROM tb_culpro_fam_pre WHERE STATUS = #{status}
and STATUS in (2,5)
and STATUS in (1,2,3)
and STATUS in (0,1,2,3,4,6)
order by itemUpdateAt desc
mapper.update: update tb_culpro_fam_pre set VISIT_NUM = VISIT_NUM + 1 where itemID = #{itemid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and itemCode = #{itemcode,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select:
select
,
from tb_culpro_fam_pre WHERE NAME LIKE "%"#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" or SOURCE LIKE "%"#{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" or PRESCRIPTION LIKE "%"#{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" or VISIT_NUM LIKE "%"#{visitNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}"%" or STATUS LIKE "%"#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" or TYPE LIKE "%"#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" or CREATER LIKE "%"#{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" or UPDATER LIKE "%"#{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" order by itemUpdateAt desc
